body:
Features and Enhancements

Compare Networks Export
  • Added the option to include Specialty Mapping details on the Compare Networks PDF export.
    • In Custom PDF Export modal, check Specialty Mapping Details.
Activity Stream
  • Added an activity for changing the specialty mapping.
Competitive Access and Population Files
  • Changed the population file upload to be consistent with the rest of the system.
  • Displaying the name of creator and date in the Population File dropdown.
Network Builder and Optimizer (NBO)
  • Separated the Cost and Quality charts on the Network Model Summary page.
Settings page
  • Displaying Project Name and Specialty Mapping while in Settings.
